returns._0: moduleAddress The address of the module.
moduleType The type of the module as a string.

params.moduleType: The name of the module type.

returns._0: moduleTypeInterfaceId The interface ID of the module type as bytes4.
isRegistered True if the module is registered, false otherwise.

registerModule(string,address).details: Enforced to be only callable by the protocol admin in governance.

params.moduleType: The type of the module being registered.
params.name: The name of the module to be registered.

registerModuleType(string,bytes4).details: Enforced to be only callable by the protocol admin in governance.

params.interfaceId: The interface ID associated with the module type.
params.name: The name of the module type to be registered.

removeModule(string).details: Enforced to be only callable by the protocol admin in governance.

removeModuleType(string).details: Enforced to be only callable by the protocol admin in governance.

params.name: The name of the module type to be removed.

getModule(string).notice: Returns the address of a registered module by its name.

getModuleType(address).notice: Returns the module type of a registered module by its address.

getModuleTypeInterfaceId(string).notice: Returns the interface ID of a registered module type.

isRegistered(address).notice: Checks if a module is registered in the protocol.

registerModule(string,address).notice: Registers a new module in the registry.

registerModule(string,address,string).notice: Registers a new module in the registry with an associated module type.

registerModuleType(string,bytes4).notice: Registers a new module type in the registry associate with an interface.

removeModule(string).notice: Removes a module from the registry.

removeModuleType(string).notice: Removes a module type from the registry.
